title: Crayon Art
description: Un style d'illustration charmant de livre pour enfants caractérisé par des textures lourdes ressemblant au crayon de couleur, au pastel gras et à la gouache sèche sur papier rugueux. Il présente des proportions naïves et ludiques, une palette terreuse et chaleureuse, et une finition tactile faite à la main où le grain du papier est visiblement intégré dans l'ombrage.
prompt: A delightful, highly textured children's book illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a whimsical mixed-media style combining colored pencils, wax crayons, and dry gouache. The artwork simulates a rough, tactile surface, perhaps heavy watercolor paper or cardstock, where the grain creates natural noise and white speckles within the color blocks. The {{subject}} is depicted with charming, slightly exaggerated proportions—round shapes, expressive features, and a naive, folk-art influence. The color palette is dominated by warm, comforting shades of {{primary_color}}, with scratchy, hand-drawn details and patterns in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is flat and ambient, typical of 2D illustration, relying on texture density rather than realistic shadows to create depth. Lines are imperfect and scratchy, suggesting a quick, creative hand. The composition feels cozy and intimate, evoking a sense of innocent storytelling and indie artistic flair. Reinforcement tags: textured digital painting, analog aesthetic, dry brush, scuff marks, pastel texture, matte finish, cozy atmosphere, playful character design, indie picture book, flat perspective, granular shading, vibrant yet earthy, 4k, high resolution, tactile rendering.
background_prompt: A cozy, cluttered interior wall or backdrop filled with an eclectic arrangement of framed sketches, art prints, and doodles in a naive style. Interspersed are stylized potted plants with scratchy leaf textures. The scene is rendered in {{primary_color}} tones with {{accent_color}} details, featuring heavy paper grain, dry crayon textures, and a flat, illustrative perspective suitable for a children's book setting. No central subject, only the textured environment.
description_en: A charming children's book illustration style characterized by heavy textures resembling colored pencil, wax crayon, and dry gouache on rough paper. It features naive, playful proportions, a warm earthy palette, and a tactile, hand-drawn finish where the paper grain is visibly integrated into the shading.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration charmant de livre pour enfants caractérisé par des textures lourdes ressemblant au crayon de couleur, au pastel gras et à la gouache sèche sur papier rugueux. Il présente des proportions naïves et ludiques, une palette terreuse et chaleureuse, et une finition tactile faite à la main où le grain du papier est visiblement intégré dans l'ombrage.
prompt_removebg: A delightful, highly textured children's book illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a mixed-media style resembling dry gouache, wax crayons, and colored pencils applied to rough grain paper. The artistic rendering is whimsical and naive, featuring playful proportions, expressive features, and simplified geometric forms typical of mid-century storybook art. The surface texture is the defining characteristic: visible dry brushstrokes, scuffed wax resist effects, grainy noise, and scratchy pencil lines that create a tactile, handmade feel. The color palette is vibrant but slightly desaturated, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant hue for the main subject, with energetic details and patterns in {{accent_color}}. Lighting is flat and illustrative, avoiding realistic volumetric rendering in favor of texture density and cross-hatching to suggest depth. The subject is isolated and composited against a clean {{background_color}} background, ensuring the rough, organic edges of the drawing are clearly defined against the {{background_color}} surface. The mood is cozy, creative, and nostalgic, evoking the feeling of a beloved classic picture book. No photorealism, heavy paper grain, matte finish.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Un style d'illustration ludique et dessiné à la main qui imite les croquis au marqueur numérique avec des contours à l'encre gras et d'épaisseur variable et des aplats de couleurs. Caractérisé par une anatomie simplifiée, des symboles émotifs flottants (points d'exclamation, bulles de dialogue) et des motifs abstraits décoratifs comme des rayures et des fleurs, typiques de l'image de marque des blogs technologiques modernes.
prompt: A high-contrast digital ink illustration rendered in a sketchy editorial doodle style, featuring {{subject}}. The medium mimics a felt-tip marker on smooth paper, defined by confident, variable-width black outlines that exhibit slight organic jitter and tapered endpoints, rejecting perfect geometric vector precision for a hand-drawn aesthetic. The rendering is strictly 2D flat design with zero shading, gradients, or depth mapping. The color palette is extremely limited, utilizing jet black for all contours and primary details, paper-white for negative space, and {{accent_color}} as a singular pop-color for focal points and decorative fills. The composition is dynamic and exploded, surrounding the {{subject}} with a chaotic but balanced array of floating graphic elements: handwritten text snippets, emotive symbols like exclamation points and motion lines, and oversized decorative motifs including striped leaves, polka-dot geometric blocks, and abstract squiggles. Textures are flat, with visual interest created through bold hatching patterns (thick diagonal stripes) inside specific shapes rather than tonal variation. The lighting is non-existent; the image relies entirely on line weight and {{primary_color}} contrast to define form. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, conveying a sense of productivity and creative energy through the 'sketchbook' visual language. Edges are hard and crisp, simulating a high-resolution scan of an ink drawing.
background_prompt: A playful, flat-design background pattern composed of scattered editorial doodle elements. The scene features a rhythmic arrangement of abstract shapes drawn in bold black ink lines: oversized floral motifs with striped petals, floating geometric blocks filled with diagonal hatching, loose squiggles, and handwritten symbols like exclamation marks and speech bubbles. There is no central subject. The palette is restricted to black ink outlines, white fills, and touches of {{accent_color}} on a neutral surface. The style is strictly 2D and unshaded, mimicking a casual sketchbook page filled with creative brainstorming doodles. The layout creates a sense of scattered energy and 'white space' breathing room.

Characterized by a mix of simplified anatomy, floating emotive symbols (exclamation marks, speech bubbles), and decorative abstract patterns like stripes and florals, typical of modern tech-blog branding.

title: Editorial Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et plat, caractérisé par des formes géométriques épurées, des couleurs vives unies et des formes simplifiées. Il utilise des ombrages aux bords nets et des arrière-plans audacieux, rappelant l'art éditorial technologique contemporain et l'image de marque d'entreprise haut de gamme.
prompt: A sophisticated flat vector illustration of {{subject}} designed in a modern editorial style. The artwork features clean, sharp lines and simplified geometric shapes to construct the form, avoiding realistic textures in favor of smooth, matte surfaces. The rendering is strictly 2D with lineless definitions between shapes, mimicking the aesthetic of high-end digital vector graphics created in Adobe Illustrator. The subject is stylized with playful proportions, smooth curves, and sharp angles, stripping away unnecessary detail for a minimalist look. Use a vibrant color palette where {{primary_color}} dominates the solid, untextured background and major compositional elements, while {{accent_color}} provides bold, graphic contrast in specific details, patterns, or accessories. Shadows are rendered as hard-edged, solid shapes of a slightly darker tone than the base color, creating a crisp, paper-cutout effect without gradients, blurring, or ambient occlusion. The lighting is uniform and flat, enhancing the graphic design feel. The overall atmosphere is professional, optimistic, and trendy. reinforcement tags: flat design, vector art, corporate memphis, behance, dribbble, minimalist, sharp edges, 4k, high contrast, vibrant colors, commercial illustration, digital art, smooth finish, geometric abstraction, joyful, trendy, no outlines, solid colors.

title: Matte Clay
description: Ce style présente une esthétique de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisée par des textures lisses et mates qui ressemblent à du plastique souple ou à de la pâte à modeler. Il utilise un éclairage global doux et diffus ainsi que des palettes de couleurs pastel pour créer une apparence propre et ludique, typique des icônes d'interface utilisateur haut de gamme et du motion design moderne.
prompt: A pristine, high-end 3D rendering of {{subject}} designed in a minimalist 'Matte Clay' or claymorphism aesthetic. The subject is stylized with simplified geometry, featuring rounded edges, soft bevels, and a charming, toy-like proportion. The material texture is paramount: it must appear incredibly smooth, non-reflective, and velvety, resembling high-quality soft-touch silicone, matte plastic, or refined modeling clay. The color palette focuses on a dominant, soothing shade of {{primary_color}}, complemented by subtle details in {{accent_color}} to create visual interest without overwhelming the simplicity. The lighting is engineered for softness: utilize a high-key studio setup with broad softboxes and global illumination (GI) to banish all harsh shadows. Shadows should be limited to gentle ambient occlusion and soft contact shadows that ground the object. There is no gloss, specular highlights, or metallic reflection; the finish is purely satin and matte. The image should evoke a sense of playfulness and modern design elegance. Reinforcement tags: 3d icon, isometric view, cinema 4d, blender cycles, octane render, cute, clean lines, solid background, subsurface scattering, ambient occlusion, low poly look, smooth curves, pastel tones, ui design, 4k, ultra-detailed, photorealistic materials, soft lighting.

Floating in the periphery are abstract, geometric primitives like spheres, rounded cubes, or pills in {{accent_color}} with a soft clay texture, positioned to create a decorative frame or depth of field effect without cluttering the center. title: Line Sketch
description: Une illustration de style vectoriel moderne présentant des contours à l'encre lâches et dessinés à la main, remplis de blocs de couleurs unies. Cette esthétique minimaliste repose sur l'espace négatif et des palettes limitées, typiques des storyboards architecturaux et de l'image de marque des entreprises SaaS.
prompt: A professional digital vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a clean, corporate sketch aesthetic. The artwork is defined by fluid, hand-drawn black ink outlines that are confident and slightly organic, mimicking the look of a high-quality marker drawing or architectural concept sketch. The coloring strategy is strictly flat, utilizing solid, unshaded blocks of {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone and {{accent_color}} for strategic highlights, all set against a stark, pure white background. Avoid any gradients, realistic textures, or 3D rendering effects; the style relies entirely on the high contrast between the crisp black linework and the bold color fills. Use negative space intelligently, often leaving skin tones or neutral surfaces as uncolored white space to maintain a minimalist feel. The character proportions should be semi-realistic but simplified for clarity, evoking a sense of modern business efficiency and collaboration. The lighting is flat and implied only through color placement, with no cast shadows or ambient occlusion. Reinforcement tags: vector illustration, hand-drawn lines, flat design, corporate art, minimalist, 2D, architectural storyboard, ink outline, clean lines, business editorial, high contrast, sharp focus, digital marker, isolated on white.

Il se distingue par un cône de lumière net et dramatique qui crée un fort contraste entre le centre lumineux et les zones environnantes plus sombres.
prompt: A charming, textured digital editorial illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in the style of hand-drawn chalk pastels mixed with risograph printing aesthetics. The visual texture is heavy and grainy, resembling rough paper or noise, giving the image a tactile, analog feel. The composition is flat and graphic, utilizing a naive perspective with slightly rough, organic edges rather than sharp vector lines. A defining feature is the lighting: a dramatic, hard-edged conical spotlight shines down across the scene, creating a sharp division between the illuminated area (which is bright and slightly washed out) and the surrounding shadowed area (which is richer and darker in tone). The color palette is dominated by muted {{primary_color}} hues in the background and shadows, with pops of {{accent_color}} highlighting the focal points within the light beam. White outlines are used sparingly to define shapes. The overall mood is cozy, indie, and creative, typical of modern editorial illustrations found in lifestyle magazines. No photorealism, heavy stippling effect, matte finish.
description_en: A cozy, textured digital illustration style mimicking chalk pastels and risograph printing with a grainy, hand-drawn feel. It features a distinct, hard-edged cone of light that creates a dramatic contrast between the bright, washed-out center and the darker, shadowed surroundings.

title: Vintage Stamp
description: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
description_en: This style replicates the aesthetic of mid-century rubber stamps, linocuts, or matchbox art, characterized by a limited duotone palette and uneven, textured ink application. It features bold graphic shapes, negative space detailing, and a coarse, grainy finish on warm, aged paper.
description_fr: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
prompt: A vintage linocut and rubber stamp style illustration of {{subject}}. The artwork mimics the distinct look of mid-century matchbox label art or folk block printing. The image utilizes a strict two-tone ink palette on a warm, off-white cream paper background. The {{subject}} is rendered primarily in heavy, textured {{primary_color}} ink, defining the main volume and silhouette. title: Velvet Noir
description: Ce style capture l'essence dramatique de la photographie de film noir classique, caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté et une atmosphère sombre et mystérieuse. Il présente un fort contre-jour, une brume volumétrique et une texture de grain de film distincte qui crée une profondeur cinématographique douce.
description_en: This style captures the dramatic essence of classic film noir photography, characterized by high-contrast chiaroscuro lighting and a moody, mysterious atmosphere. It features strong rim lighting, volumetric haze, and a distinct film grain texture that creates a soft, cinematic depth.
description_fr: Ce style capture l'essence dramatique de la photographie de film noir classique, caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté et une atmosphère sombre et mystérieuse. Il présente un fort contre-jour, une brume volumétrique et une texture de grain de film distincte qui crée une profondeur cinématographique douce.
prompt: A stunning, cinematic film noir style photograph of {{subject}} captured with a vintage 35mm camera. The scene is defined by dramatic, high-contrast chiaroscuro lighting, where deep shadows conceal details and intense rim lighting (backlighting) creates a glowing halo effect around the silhouette of the {{subject}}. The atmosphere is thick with volumetric fog and cigarette smoke haze, diffusing the light sources into soft, large, creamy bokeh orbs in the background. The background consists of a textured, wrinkled fabric or canvas backdrop, adding to the studio portrait aesthetic. The overall image possesses a tactile quality, characterized by heavy noise, dust, scratches, and a low-contrast vintage grade. title: Indigo Intaglio
description: Un style visuel sophistiqué imitant la gravure sur acier du XIXe siècle et les techniques d'illustration de billets de banque. Il se caractérise par un travail au trait précis et très contrasté, où le volume et la texture sont rendus exclusivement par des hachures parallèles et croisées dans une palette strictement bichrome.
description_en: A sophisticated visual style mimicking 19th-century steel engraving and banknote illustration techniques. It features precise, high-contrast line work where volume and texture are rendered exclusively through parallel hatching and cross-hatching in a strict duotone palette.
description_fr: Un style visuel sophistiqué imitant la gravure sur acier du XIXe siècle et les techniques d'illustration de billets de banque. Il se caractérise par un travail au trait précis et très contrasté, où le volume et la texture sont rendus exclusivement par des hachures parallèles et croisées dans une palette strictement bichrome.
prompt:
A masterful steel engraving illustration of {{subject}}, executed in the style of 19th-century scientific botanical and zoological plates. The rendering medium is a strict simulation of copperplate etching or intaglio printing, characterized by incredibly precise, sharp, vector-quality line work without any grey wash or gradients. Volume, form, and shading are constructed entirely through disciplined parallel hatching, contour hatching that wraps around the 3D geometry of the {{subject}}, and dense cross-hatching for the deepest shadows. The line weight varies intelligently—thicker, confident ink strokes define the outer silhouette and major structural elements, while microscopic, tapered hair-lines describe the surface texture (such as fur, feathers, or petals). 

The color palette is strictly duotone: deep, saturated {{primary_color}} ink stamped onto a clean, matte {{accent_color}} paper background. There is no chromatic blending; colors are binary, relying on optical mixing through line density to create perceived tonal values. Lighting is conceptual and studio-like {{lighting}}, indicated solely by the absence of ink (paper white) for highlights and heavy line convergence for occlusion shadows. The aesthetic is academic, timeless, and reminiscent of high-security banknote art or vintage encyclopedia illustrations. The composition is centered and elegant, surrounded by ample negative space to emphasize the specimen-like isolation of the {{subject}}. {{mood}} atmosphere conveyed through the rigidity and perfection of the engraving technique.
prompt_removebg: A masterfully executed copperplate engraving and intaglio print of {{subject}}, rendered with the forensic precision of a 19th-century zoological illustration reminiscent of Thomas Bewick or Albrecht Dürer. The image is constructed entirely from distinct, high-contrast lines of {{primary_color}} ink, utilizing expert cross-hatching, stippling, and curved contour hatching to generate volumetric form and texture. There are absolutely no smooth gradients, washes, or gray values; shading is achieved strictly through optical mixing via line density and spacing. The {{subject}} features microscopic attention to surface details—individual feathers, fur strands, or architectural elements are depicted with directional ink strokes that follow the organic curvature of the form. The lighting is conceptual and uniform, typical of academic study plates, revealing maximum structural detail. The artwork is isolated against a clean, flat {{background_color}} backdrop, specifically optimized for background removal. The edges of the {{subject}} are defined by the sharp, deliberate termination of ink lines rather than a continuous thick outline, creating a crisp, high-contrast silhouette against the {{background_color}} negative space. {{accent_color}} is applied sparingly to focal points or distinct markings, maintaining a predominantly duotone aesthetic. The line quality mimics the pressure sensitivity of a burin tool, with tapered starts and stops. The overall composition is static, dignified, and encyclopedic.
background_prompt: A vintage parchment background texture in {{accent_color}} tones, subtly overlaid with faint, decorative engraved patterns in {{primary_color}}. Elements include delicate botanical filigree, ruled geometric lines reminiscent of financial guilloche patterns, and faint, etched atmospheric dust. The background serves as a flat, paper-like canvas that enhances the foreground engraving without competing for focus, maintaining the strict duotone etching aesthetic.
background_prompt_removebg: A vintage academic background texture featuring faint, low-opacity schematic diagrams and botanical sketches in muted {{primary_color}}. The composition includes fragmented serif typography, Latin scientific labels, and fine measurement grid lines typical of an aged naturalist's field journal or encyclopedia plate. The elements are arranged peripherally to frame the center, rendered on a flat {{background_color}} surface with a paper-grain texture implied only by the roughness of the ink lines, avoiding heavy noise that would interfere with foreground layering.

title: Naive Gouache
description: Un style d'illustration contemporain vibrant imitant la gouache opaque et l'acrylique au pinceau sec sur papier texturé. Il présente des perspectives aplaties, des blocs de couleurs audacieux sans contours noirs, et une finition peinte à la main charmante et imparfaite avec des marques de poils visibles et des textures crayeuses.
description_en: A vibrant contemporary illustration style mimicking opaque gouache paint and dry-brush acrylics on textured paper. It features flattened perspectives, bold color blocking without black outlines, and a charmingly imperfect, hand-painted finish with visible bristle marks and chalky textures.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration contemporain vibrant imitant la gouache opaque et l'acrylique au pinceau sec sur papier texturé. Il présente des perspectives aplaties, des blocs de couleurs audacieux sans contours noirs, et une finition peinte à la main charmante et imparfaite avec des marques de poils visibles et des textures crayeuses.
prompt: A charming, contemporary editorial illustration rendered in the specific medium of opaque gouache and dry-brush acrylic markers on heavy cold-press paper. The visual style is characterized by a naive, flattened perspective where {{subject}} is depicted with simplified geometry, playful proportions, and a lack of strict anatomical realism. The rendering technique focuses on bold color blocking; forms are defined not by black outlines but by the juxtaposition of high-contrast hues and rough, organic edges. The brushwork is distinctively 'dry', showing visible bristle streaks, scumbled textures, and areas where the paint thins to reveal the tooth of the paper beneath, creating a tactile, chalky matte finish. The lighting is non-realistic and uniform, eliminating cast shadows and specular highlights in favor of a 2D graphical clarity. The color palette is exuberant and saturated, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant field and {{accent_color}} for popping details, with deep ultramarine or cobalt blue used exclusively for darker tonal values instead of black. The composition feels spontaneous and handcrafted, with slightly trembling lines and 'wobbly' straight edges that emphasize the human touch. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, evoking a sense of cozy, wholesome simplicity found in modern lifestyle magazines and high-end children's literature. Finish with a granular paper texture overlay to enhance the traditional media aesthetic. {{lighting}}.
prompt_removebg: A vibrant, hand-painted illustration of {{subject}} rendered in the style of dry-brush gouache and acrylic Posca markers on cold-press watercolor paper. The artwork is characterized by a naive, contemporary editorial aesthetic with flattened perspective and bold, opaque color blocking. Use a high-saturation palette dominated by {{primary_color}} for main forms, punctuated by energetic strokes of {{accent_color}} for details and patterns. There are no black outlines; instead, forms are defined by the contrast between adjacent color fields and sketchy, loose colored pencil details overlaid on the paint. The texture is highly tactile, displaying visible dry-brush streaks, chalky matte finishes, and the granular tooth of the paper showing through thinner washes. Lighting is flat and graphic, lacking realistic gradients or cast shadows, relying instead on distinct value changes to suggest depth. The subject is composited against a clean, solid {{background_color}} backdrop to facilitate extraction, with the edges of the subject exhibiting a natural, painterly roughness—distinct and sharp enough for separation but retaining the organic irregularity of a dry brush stroke. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, captured through the playful, imperfect rhythm of the hand-drawn lines.
background_prompt: A flat, 2D illustrative background depicting a simplified environment rendered in opaque gouache. The scene consists of large, solid fields of matte color in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} applied with a dry brush technique. Architectural details or organic elements are reduced to basic geometric shapes with rough, scumbled edges and visible brushstrokes. There is no depth of field; elements are arranged on a single plane like a stage set. The texture is chalky and granular, with no realistic lighting or shadows, focusing entirely on pattern, shape interaction, and a whimsical, hand-painted aesthetic.
background_prompt_removebg: A decorative, textural background scene rendered in a dry-brush gouache style, devoid of the main subject. The composition features loose, sketchy environmental elements such as abstract organic shapes, stylized potted plants, or architectural outlines drawn in {{accent_color}} and {{primary_color}}. The surface texture mimics rough watercolor paper with visible grain and chalky paint strokes. The elements are arranged peripherally to frame a central negative space, all set against a flat, solid {{background_color}} canvas to maintain the graphic, poster-like quality of the style.

title: Risograph Pop
description: Une esthétique d'illustration vibrante et plate imitant l'impression Risograph et le mouvement japonais 'Heta-uma'. Elle se caractérise par des contours tremblants dessinés à la main, des blocs solides de couleurs hyper-saturées sans ombrage, et une texture de bruit uniforme rappelant le papier mat rugueux.
description_en: A vibrant, flat-style illustration aesthetic mimicking Risograph printing and the Japanese 'Heta-uma' (bad-good) movement. It features shaky, hand-drawn contour lines, solid blocks of hyper-saturated color with zero shading, and a heavy, uniform noise texture resembling rough matte paper.
description_fr: Une esthétique d'illustration vibrante et plate imitant l'impression Risograph et le mouvement japonais 'Heta-uma'. Elle se caractérise par des contours tremblants dessinés à la main, des blocs solides de couleurs hyper-saturées sans ombrage, et une texture de bruit uniforme rappelant le papier mat rugueux.
prompt: Digital illustration mimicking lo-fi Risograph printing and indie zine aesthetics, featuring {{subject}} rendered with strictly flat, unshaded color blocks and thin, shaky hand-drawn black outlines. The rendering technique creates a 'cut-out' graphic look where forms are defined by distinct color separation rather than light and shadow. The line work is a consistent, thin monoline ink stroke that exhibits intentional wobbly imperfections and lack of line weight variation, suggesting a rotring pen on toothy paper. There is absolutely no shading, no gradients, no volumetric lighting, and no ambient occlusion; the style is purely 2D and planar. The color palette is high-contrast and poster-like, utilizing {{primary_color}} as a dominant field color and {{accent_color}} for key details, creating a triadic or complementary vibration. Apply a heavy, uniform monochromatic noise overlay or 'salt-and-pepper' grain across the entire image to simulate rough matte paper stock, screen print mesh, or high-ISO film grain. The atmosphere is {{mood}}, conveyed through the quirky, imperfect lines and the raw immediacy of the print texture. The composition utilizes negative space to emphasize the graphic silhouette of the subject.
prompt_removebg: Digital illustration mimicking a 3-color risograph print of {{subject}}, rendered in a raw indie zine aesthetic. The medium is digital ink imitating a 0.5mm felt-tip pen with a slight hand-drawn tremble, creating a continuous, confident, yet imperfect 'ligne claire' contour. The subject is colored with flat, unmodulated fields of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, simulating semi-transparent soy-based inks layered over white paper. There is absolutely no shading, gradient, or volumetric rendering; form is defined strictly by the black ink outline and color blocking. The texture is critical: apply a heavy, uniform high-frequency noise and stipple grain across the entire image to mimic cheap matte recycled paper and ink bleed. Lighting is non-existent; the image relies on graphic clarity and high-contrast separation. The composition is centered and isolated against a solid, flat {{background_color}} backdrop to ensure optimal edge detection. The subject's edges are defined by a crisp, continuous black outline that creates a sharp cut-out silhouette against the {{background_color}} canvas, avoiding any feathered or blurred transparency. Slight color misregistration (trapping errors) is visible where the {{primary_color}} fill meets the ink lines, adding analog authenticity. The overall mood is {{mood}}, captured through the quirky, static posture of the subject.
background_prompt: A solid, flat field of {{primary_color}} completely devoid of gradients or shadows, heavily textured with uniform monochromatic grain and paper noise. Optionally includes sparse, floating decorative doodles (simple shapes, squiggles, or blobs) in {{accent_color}} drawn with the same thin, shaky black outline style, maintaining a strictly 2D poster-like appearance.
background_prompt_removebg: A textured background surface in a flat {{background_color}} hue, heavily treated with risograph grain and paper noise. Scattered floating decorative elements in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}—such as small geometric blobs, stars, or doodle-like squiggles—surround the empty center space. The elements have thin, shaky black outlines and flat color fills with slight print misalignment. The texture suggests a scanned page from a DIY fanzine, with no depth or shadows, purely graphic and ornamental.
